[{"id":"BPD-2548","entityId":"2-17169","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2548"},{"name":"summary","value":"[GQL][Front] Доработать stages на портале"},{"name":"description","value":"

Ветка с текущими наработками - featue/BPD-1920-graphql-apollo-experiment

Задачи:

  • Смерджить с текущим develop
  • Сверить GQL реализацию карточек с текущей
  • Доработать недостающий функционал и ошибки
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1540307290888"},{"name":"updated","value":"1541768971380"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"rslykov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Roman Lykov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"eaallenov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Eugene Allenov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"3"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-2491","type":"Depend","role":"is required for"},{"value":"BPD-2491","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#ff7bc3","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 36","Sprint 37"],"valueId":["Sprint 36","Sprint 37"],"color":null},{"name":"Estimation","value":["2400"],"valueId":["5d"],"color":null}],"comment":[{"id":"4-17161","author":"rslykov","authorFullName":"Roman Lykov","issueId":"BPD-2548","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
  • Не хвататет изображений у статей
  • Нет функционала добавления в избранное
  • Не отображаются авторы у видео
  •  Название раздела курсов и его содержимое отличается
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1541063571237,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"4-17163","author":"rslykov","authorFullName":"Roman Lykov","issueId":"BPD-2548","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
  • При нажатии на 'Хочу еще', выводится тот же контент
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1541063695938,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"4-17568","author":"rslykov","authorFullName":"Roman Lykov","issueId":"BPD-2548","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
  • на карточках видео не отображается рейтинг
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1541768971381,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"BPD-2363","entityId":"2-16095","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2363"},{"name":"summary","value":"Сделать переход от индикатора загрузки к контенту плавным"},{"name":"description","value":"

Сейчас, в момент загрузки контейнера, индикатор загрузки занимает определенное пространство, а когда контент подгружается это блок мгновенно исчезает и на экране в этот момент происходит рывок контента вверх. Все это смотрится не очень красиво.

Нужно продумать механизм плавной смены прелоадера на контент. Как вариант просто постепенно менять его прозрачность в момент загрузки и вообще никуда не убирать.

PIPELINE RESULTS
FAILURE

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1538051458431"},{"name":"updated","value":"1542098041748"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"aagolovanov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Golovanov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"3"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-729","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"},{"value":"BPD-2565","type":"Blocked","role":"is blocked by"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 37"],"valueId":["Sprint 37"],"color":null},{"name":"Estimation","value":["960"],"valueId":["2d"],"color":null}],"comment":[{"id":"4-16789","author":"rslykov","authorFullName":"Roman Lykov","issueId":"BPD-2363","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1540420224312,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"4-16790","author":"rslykov","authorFullName":"Roman Lykov","issueId":"BPD-2363","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Тесты сломаны, по причине появления анимации. Анимация занимает время и тесты падают из-за эмуляции клика в перекрывающий слой
transitionEnterTimeout: 1000, transitionLeaveTimeout: 1000, - текущий параметр анимации, нужно сделать поправки на 1 сек

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1540470990016,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"AWAITING FE","cssClass":"c28"}]}, {"id":"BPD-2550","entityId":"2-17173","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2550"},{"name":"summary","value":"Сделать обработку ошибок получения данных в разделе событий"},{"name":"description","value":"

При возникновении ошибки ответа сервера на странице https://dev.dasreda.ru/events, отображается бесконечный прелоадер, а в интерфейсе нет уведомления об ошибке

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1540311328164"},{"name":"updated","value":"1541750997183"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rslykov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Lykov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-747","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Minor"],"valueId":["Minor"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 37"],"valueId":["Sprint 37"],"color":null},{"name":"Estimation","value":["240"],"valueId":["4h"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Screenshot 2018-11-08 16.20.01.png","id":"5-5363","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/Screenshot%202018-11-08%2016.20.01.png?file=5-5363&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-17513","author":"APAbralava","authorFullName":"Alexander Abralava","issueId":"BPD-2550","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Нужен пример в виде скриншота или видео. Проблему не удалось воспроизвести. При загрузке указанной страницы в случае ошибки ответа сервера приходит уведомление "Не удалось получить список категорий" (на скрине).
